title: AWESOME LUXURY 1 BR!  ROOFTOP POOL, hottub, gym, so much more!! $1,937
description:
Hi everyone!  I sadly have to leave my AMAZING 1 bedroom luxury apartment (plus LOFT!) because my work transferred me suddenly.  It's really an amazing building...ROOFTOP POOL/HOT TUB and GRILLING AREA!!  Coffee shops and restaurants, including the BEST Mexican food I've ever had (and I lived in southern CA so that says something ;) Rooftop gym, rec center with pool tables and work space/printers, doorman, LAUNDRY IN APT, and so much more. I can't possibly type it all so I'm just giving you their website so you can see for yourself:
https://www.goldtexapartments.com
Rent is $1,937 per month + electric + $1,000 security deposit.
(That reminds me, Electric blinds!!!!!!!!  I've never had them before but damn are they awesome!  That view in my photos is from behind those blinds and no joke, it's incredible)
If you look at the availability on their site it shows other available apartments, but since I'm moving suddenly and transferring my lease you'd get a much better deal!
Also, the side of the building that this apt is on really has the best view of them all, and it's a corner unit on the 6th floor and you would only have neighbors on one side (quiet and comfy).
My lease is up Aug 20th, maybe earlier, so text me if you're interested! Happy to show you around!
Nathan:   show contact info
__________________________________________
THE APARTMENT:
-750 sq foot, 6th floor, corner unit (= only 1 neighbor), window FACING DOWNTOWN
-$1,937 per month, responsible for electricity only
-High ceilings, incredible MASSIVE window with electric blinds and a view that will knock your socks off
-Beautiful wood floors
-Brand new appliances in kitchen with quartz countertops and breakfast nook
-Large bedroom and large closet with sliding mirror doors
-Modern bathroom with the nicest shower I've ever used (so sad to give up the shower)
-Loft with pull-down staircase (loft overlooks the bedroom; could potentially be used as a second bedroom)
-Heat and A/C
THE BUILDING:
-Friendly 24-hour door-staff with safe and secure key fob entry to the building, packages are held at the front desk for your convenience
-Modern decor and cool murals throughout the building
-Rec room with pool table, big screen TV, seating area, work space, and printer
-Incredible ROOFTOP POOL and HOT TUB OPEN YEAR-ROUND 24/7, outdoor grill area and plenty of seating
-Rooftop gym (separate from pool area) open 24/7 with glass walls overlooking the city
-Secure bike room where you can lock up your bike(s)
-Restaurant in the building with THE BEST Mexican food I've ever tasted (El Purepecha), trust me...it's the best
-Coffee shop in the building
-Parking garage available through the building, though I use an outside lot
THE NEIGHBORHOOD:
-Bustling Callowhill neighborhood, just a stones-throw from downtown (literally 2 minute walk)
-Reading Terminal Market 5-minute walk, Trader Joe's 7-minute walk, Target 12-minute walk (I only need to drive to work, everything else I need is within walking distance)
-Many bars and restaurants within walking distance (Trestle Inn, Love City Brewing, La Chinesca...so many places)
-The Rail Park is quite literally around the corner (like The High Line in NYC)
-Safe area

title: Fully Renovated Apartment For Rent - 1 BD, 1 BA, 2 Bonus Rooms
description:
640 sq.ft. fully renovated apartment (Unit 1) in a West Philadelphia Victorian building. The unit is move-in ready and includes 1 bedroom, 1 full bathroom, 1 kitchen, 1 front room and 1 bonus room.
The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertop, dishwasher, stove and oven, fridge with freezer and microwave.
The floor is laminate for all rooms except the kitchen and bathroom that are tiled. The backdoor gives direct access to the yard.
Special feature: 24/7 security camera system that covers all entrances and common areas.
Rent is $1,150/mo with Internet Wi-Fi included. All utilities are tenant’s financial responsibility (electricity, gas and water).
The first and last payment of rent is due on lease signing as well as security deposit corresponding to one months rent.
Renter insurance is mandatory. Smoking and pets are not allowed.
The apartment is overlooking Kingsessing Park, you’ll have access to a well-maintained and thoughtful public outdoor space, featuring two tennis courts, four basketball courts, a semi-olympic swimming pool and picnic area. The building is conveniently located close to Clark Park, University City, University of Pennsylvania, CHOP and the University of the Sciences. Accessibility to local light rail is on the block!
INSTRUCTIONS TO SCHEDULE A TOUR AND APPLICATIONS
To schedule a tour, you must complete a pre-qualification form that you can find here: https://forms.gle/RXr46KPGPs1CrFZm6
No credit check, nor payment is required during this phase. After submitting this form, if pre-qualified, you will be prompt to schedule a tour of the apartment. If you don't pre-qualify, the decision is final and you won't be able to schedule a tour nor rent any unit in the building.
There are no exceptions.
After submitting the form mentioned above, if you are pre-qualified, you can submit your application through apartments.com. It costs $29.00 + tax and includes screening reports (credit and background check included).
Due to the size of the apartment, only 2 adult tenants allowed. Applicants with minors will require further discussion.

title: the heart of a thriving art museum neighborhood
description:
Now available for rent! 2012 poplar is indeed a coveted rarity with over 3,000 square feet of light-filled, gracious living space, in the heart of a thriving art museum neighborhood. A free-standing home with a stately presence, this four bedroom, 4.5 bath gem boasts expansively-proportioned rooms, high ceilings, and open-concept city living at its finest. The main live space is warm and comfortable, with striking hardwood floors, elegant crown molding, recessed lighting, and a peak through to the lush green from the stunning garden at the rear of the home. The european-style kitchen is absolutely the focal point of the first floor. Custom cabinetry, classic white marble countertops, stainless appliances including a beautiful aga range, farmhouse sink, convenient breakfast bar, and statement pendant lighting. The spacious dining room boasts gorgeous views of the garden, a private, fully enclosed oasis of lush landscaping and year round enjoyment. A convenient powder room completes the first floor of this lovely home. Upstairs, a large and light-filled owner's suite sits at the front of floor two, which boasts the same striking hardwood flooring. Plentiful closets and an elegant marble bath with dual sink and oversized shower. A second spacious bedroom and full bath complete this floor. 2012 offers unique flexibility, as floor three of the home boasts a third expansive bedroom which might also be an owner's suite. A fourth classic bedroom and a full bath, and those gorgeous hardwood floors complete the third floor. Up a quick flight to sweeping panoramic city skyline views and tremendous open-air entertainment space from the fabulous rooftop deck. Expanding the home's value exponentially, the lower level is completely and beautifully finished, replete with a higher ceiling, comfortable living area, spacious bedroom and full bath, excellent storage, and laundry. And yes, those stunning hardwood floors! Simply an exceptional, loved property in every way, in a walkable neighborhood surrounded by art and culture, fine and casual dining, shopping, easy access to transportation, the schuylkill river trail, fairmount park, and so much more. description:
Located within an elegant brownstone in a vibrant section of washington square west, you will be wowed by this gorgeous 2 bedrooms, 2 bathroom condo. description: Welcome to 1802 Fairmount Ave #1! This is a great 2 bedroom / 1.5 bathroom apartment nestled in the beautiful Fairmount neighborhood. Enter into the living room with hardwood flooring and access to your half bathroom and first bedroom. The bedroom is large and spacious, offering hardwood floors, a faux fireplace, and big windows for natural light. Continue to your kitchen and dining area with an open floor plan and large windows. Your kitchen boasts gray shaker cabinets, good prep space, and stainless steel dishwasher and gas oven / stove. From here, you can access your full bathroom equipped with slate tile flooring, vanity, stacked washer & dryer, and standing shower stall with sleek glass door. Your second bedroom features hardwood flooring and sunlight, plus a door to your outdoor space! This private patio is huge with ample room for patio furniture and a grill. There are 2 entrances for this unit for added convenience. Call for a tour today! About The Neighborhood: Located in Fairmount, known for it's lovely tree-lined streets and great eateries. Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: cozy 3bd 1ba house for rent
description:
Cozy 3-Bedroom/1-Bathroom house for rent in Drexel Hill. Located on historic Marshall Road, the home has had some recent renovations and has all the charm you can possibly be looking for!
Entry is into the living room which includes an open floor plan and refinished flooring which looks absolutely stunning. Plenty of space for entertaining guests and hosting holidays! With open entry into the dining room, there is plenty of space for a six-seat dining set. The kitchen includes patterned tile flooring, an L-shape design with dark oak cabinets, light countertops, four-burner electric range, and a full-sized stainless steel refrigerator. There is plenty of storage space throughout the cabinets and the set of kitchen drawers are perfect for making sure everything stays organized!
The second floor has the full bathroom which includes stone tile flooring, a large vanity with medicine cabinet, a freshly glazed full-sized bathtub/shower, and an incredible tile surround across the entire perimeter of the bathroom. This bathroom truly feels like having a spa inside your own home!
The front bedroom is very large, includes windows on two walls, and great closet space. This is a wonderful master bedroom and is large enough to accommodate a queen-sized bed with ease! The other two bedrooms are suited with ample closet space and also receive plenty of natural light which makes both bedrooms feel incredibly bright and open.
There is also an unfinished basement which is perfect for additional storage and provides access to the washer, central AC handler, and water boiler. The basement provides access to the garage and exterior parking space behind the home as well!
Rent covers all utilities, pet okay.
Listed by property owner.
Located in Drexel Hill, the Marshall Road Station is a one-minute walk! You will also be surround by plenty of great shops, restaurants, and entertainment. Access to Route 1 and 3 is a breeze as well as 476 which makes commuting into the city and other nearby neighborhoods quick and easy!

Up a quick flight to sweeping panoramic city skyline views and tremendous open-air entertainment space from the fabulous rooftop deck. title: 3 bdr/3 bath Townhouse
description:
A spacious 3 bedroom, 2 full bath, 2 half bath and 2 car garage townhouse located within a 5 min walk to the train station, shops and restaurants in downtown Ambler. A 35 min ride to Philadelphia and just a short drive to Conshohocken, Fort Washington, Plymouth Meeting, and the Turnpike.
This 2,960 sq ft townhouse boasts a spacious master bedroom with trayed ceiling & fan, private bath, his and hers sinks, shower and large walk-in closet. 3rd floor also has 2 other bedrooms with plenty of closet space.  In the 3rd floor hallway, there is a full bathroom with storage closet and laundry room.
2nd floor great room gets plenty of natural light with high ceilings and built-in speakers. Beautiful kitchen with high hats, stainless steel GE appliances, island and breakfast bar. 8x8 sq ft deck off the kitchen.
First floor has a 2 car powered garage where you enter into a first floor room perfect for an office, game room or workout space, plus a storage closet and half bath. The location cannot be any more prime. Ambler train stop is a block away, this is a wonderful location in a great community!
